CLIENT_ERROR.MESSAGE: Does your device have internet access? Maybe is our fault and our servers are down

RENDER_MAP_ERROR.MESSAGE: We had an error loading the map, please try again

INTERNAL_ERROR.MESSAGE: Sorry, we are having internal issues. Try again later

NOT_FOUND_ERROR.MESSAGE: The page you are searching doesn't exist. You are being a bad guy or it's our fault.

PROGRAMMING_ERROR.MESSAGE: We suck, our code had a programming error and we didn't notice it. Send us an email!

FORBIDDEN_ERROR.MESSAGE: The page you're looking for is forbidden for your role. You're either being naughty or it's our fault.

EMERGENCY_NUMBER.INCORRECT_PHONE_NUMBER: The emergency phone number isn't correct

SIGNUP.ALREADY_EXISTING_USER: User already exists with this phone number

INFO.BODY: Most refuges don't actually have a reservation system. Guests are expected to use them whenever they want. However, RefuApp aims to provide a mechanism through which guests can notify other RefuApp users about their intent to visit a given refuge on a specific date, making it easier to determine if a refuge will likely be full or not.

DELETE_ALERT.SUBHEADER: Do you want to delete your reservation?
DELETE_ALERT.MESSAGE: Do you want to delete your reservation for the day {{day}}?

DELETE_OPERATION.NOT_FOUND: Reservation doesn't exists, maybe it was already deleted?

CREATE_OPERATION.NOT_AUTHENTICATED_OR_INVALID_DATE: The selected date is invalid! Or you are doing something weird
CREATE_OPERATION.NOT_ALLOWED_CREATION_FOR_USER: You can't create a reservation for another user
CREATE_OPERATION.REFUGE_OR_USER_NOT_FOUND: Refuge or user has been deleted, refresh the page
CREATE_OPERATION.PROGRAMMING_ERROR: We suck, our code had a programming error and we didn't notice it. Send us an email!

DETAILS.MESSAGE: The day {{day}} of month {{month}} of year: {{year}}

UNAUTHORIZED_ERROR.MESSAGE: You are not authorized to access this resource. Are you logged in?
